item.title: Getting Started with AI Coding Tools - A Developer's Practical Guide

item.title: Building Software Outside of Work - Dev Leader Weekly 123
item.description: Welcome to another issue of Dev Leader Weekly! In this issue, I discuss how and why to build software outside of work as a software developer! Link to article: https://www.devleader.ca/2026/01/17/building-software-outside-of-work-dev-leader-weekly-123
